metadata.title: Barq - Fast and Reliable Delivery Services
metadata.description: Experience swift and dependable delivery services with Barq. Sign up now to get started!

title.default: Barq - Fast and Reliable Food Delivery in Egypt

RootLayout.description: Experience swift and dependable food delivery services with Barq. Order from 3,855+ restaurants across Egypt. Join 985M+ successful deliveries with 1,879+ positive reviews.

openGraph.title: Barq - Fast and Reliable Food Delivery in Egypt
openGraph.description: Experience swift and dependable food delivery services with Barq. Order from 3,855+ restaurants across Egypt.

twitter.title: Barq - Fast and Reliable Food Delivery in Egypt
twitter.description: Experience swift and dependable food delivery services with Barq. Order from 3,855+ restaurants across Egypt.

HeroSection.description: We commit to delivering your food to you within 30 minutes. if we would fail, we will give the food free.

DishesSection.title: Access Thousands of Dishes with Just a Tap
DishesSection.description: Our system grants you instant access to thousands of dishes and diverse cuisines—all it takes is a single tap on your screen.

DownloadAppSection.title: Download app to enjoy 4500+ foods from 1200+ restaurants
DownloadAppSection.description: Download our app to your phone from the stores and start enjoying a wealth of exclusive features and benefits immediately

FeaturesSection.restaurantDescription: Our system provides you with a centralized dashboard for full control over workflow, from receiving orders to generating financial reports, allowing you to focus on your food quality and customer service.
FeaturesSection.restaurantFeature1Desc: Orders are instantly and accurately routed to the kitchen or delivery department, significantly reducing waiting time and boosting customer satisfaction.
FeaturesSection.restaurantFeature2Desc: Connect your ordering app directly to your Point of Sale (POS) system. Log all sales, track inventory, and issue accurate invoices, all from one unified platform.
FeaturesSection.customerDescription: Order your favorite meal or products with ultimate ease and speed! Our app is designed to provide an intuitive and rapid user experience, from selecting the item to completing the payment in simple, comfortable steps.
FeaturesSection.customerFeature1Desc: The fastest delivery in the city! Rely on our smart fleet to ensure your order arrives fresh and on time, so you can enjoy your product without the wait.
FeaturesSection.customerFeature2Desc: Follow your order step-by-step in real-time. Watch the delivery agent's location directly on the map and accurately predict the arrival time for total peace of mind.

HowItWorksSection.title: How it Works
HowItWorksSection.step1Title: Download App & create a free account
HowItWorksSection.step1Desc: Simply download the app and create your profile. Unlock instant access to every restaurant, menu, and deal in your area.
HowItWorksSection.step2Title: Place orders at your preferred eatery
HowItWorksSection.step2Desc: Customize your meal, and complete your payment. Our smart filtering makes it fast and fun to discover your next favorite.
HowItWorksSection.step3Title: Get it delivered directly to your home, effortlessly
HowItWorksSection.step3Desc: Track your order from the kitchen to your door. Our drivers ensure lightning-fast delivery, so you can enjoy your perfect meal.
HowItWorksSection.discountText: Get 50% off on your first order! Grab it now.

WhyChooseUsSection.title: Why choose us
WhyChooseUsSection.description: We are the only platform that truly unites speed, selection, and reliability for both customers and businesses.
WhyChooseUsSection.feature1Desc: Get your favorite meals delivered fresh and fast to your door in just 30 minutes! Enjoy the convenience!
WhyChooseUsSection.feature2Desc: Enjoy premium meals from top local restaurants, expertly crafted to satisfy your taste and elevate your dining experience!
WhyChooseUsSection.feature3Desc: Easily track your order in real-time with our live map feature, ultimate convenience and keeping you updated every step of the way!
